sentences.en: Another flight would be arranged on Saturday if sufficient demand arose.
sentences.cn: 如果需求量足够大，周六将再安排一趟航班。

sentences.en: Camden Market is the place to be on a Saturday or Sunday.
sentences.cn: 卡姆登市场是周末的最佳去处。

sentences.en: He easily overcame Garcia, Saturday's conqueror of Ernie Els.
sentences.cn: 他轻松战胜了星期六击败厄尼·埃尔斯的加西亚。

sentences.en: I always do it last thing on a Saturday.
sentences.cn: 这件事我总是放在星期六晚上睡觉前做。

sentences.en: I was pleased with my performance on Saturday — everything went right.
sentences.cn: 我对自己星期六的表现挺满意——一切顺利。

sentences.en: I will be anything but quiet on Saturday night!
sentences.cn: 星期六的晚上我根本静不下心来！

sentences.en: I've asked Mum to sit for us next Saturday.
sentences.cn: 我已经拜托妈妈下周六为我们临时照看一下孩子。

sentences.en: It was Saturday; they could close the office early.
sentences.cn: 那天是星期六，他们可以早点下班。

sentences.en: Last Saturday, I was out on the town with my mate.
sentences.cn: 上个星期六我和老友晚上去闹市玩乐了。

sentences.en: On Saturday morning, the town hums with activity and life.
sentences.cn: 周六早晨，小镇一派热闹繁忙，活力盎然。

sentences.en: Saturday night was a late-night shopping night.
sentences.cn: 周六晚上购物可以持续到深夜。

sentences.en: Searchers have found three mountain climbers missing since Saturday.
sentences.cn: 搜救人员已经找到了周六失踪的3名登山者。

sentences.en: She had a call from him on Saturday morning at the studio.
sentences.cn: 星期六早上她在录音室接到他打来的电话。

sentences.en: The club has moved its meeting to Saturday, January 22nd.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部已经把会议日期改到1月22号，星期六。
庆祝活动从星期六开始。

sentences.en: The police said he'd been formally indicted on Saturday.
sentences.cn: 警方称他星期六已被正式起诉。

trans.tran_en: the day between Friday and Sunday
the day between Friday and Sunday
